website_summaries.verdict: These basic rings come in your choice of colors – a great option if you want to color code by height.
pros: Two sturdy plastic gymnastic rings with polycarbonate nylon straps
cons: Rings are slippery when sweaty, but you can cover them with sports tape

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Product Failure
customer_reviews.text: Had these rings for less than a year. Light to moderate use during that period of time. I was mid workout when both rings failed and broke simultaneously. I fell inverted landing on the back of my head and neck resulting in a trip to the ER and now several trips to the Chiropractor and physical therapy for treatment. I have reached out to the manufacturere Reehut several times with no response. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: April Ann Wilhite

customer_reviews.title: You Will Get HURT With This Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: In the first few minutes that we hung these in our garage, our daughter fell 6 feet to the concrete. We were shocked and she is terribly bruised! The stitching holding the bracket came undone and the entire strap gave way. This product is faulty and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: modern decorator

customer_reviews.title: He's said it repeatedly in his podcast and in his book Discipline Equals Freedom (page 116) that gymnastic rings are a great workout. Plenty of exercises from dips to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Took Jocko Willink's advice, and you should too. He's said it repeatedly in his podcast and in his book Discipline Equals Freedom (page 116) that gymnastic rings are a great workout. Plenty of exercises from dips to pull ups to push ups to gut work. In fact, that's my workout for tonight. And the cool things is, you can take them just about anywhere. Sturdy tree branch in a park? CHECK. High pull up bar at your gym? CHECK. Water pipe in a parking garage? CHECK. Get some and GET AFTER IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are the greatest workout I've ever had! Don't let the idiots who hook up the straps wrong detour you from buying these, if done right, there's no problem. Rings are sturdy and well made as well but slippery when sweaty, sports tape takes care of that though. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: The12voltdude

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Only 20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking around Amazon for a high quality set of rings at an affordable price, and these do the job. They have good grip, they are adjustable, and they only took 5 minutes to set up.
customer_reviews.author: The Certified Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, sturdy and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: The rings and straps are very good and you can't beat the price. I have these set up in the rafters in my garage and after only two days I look like a Russian gymnast on steroids! At least my wife thinks so. Great workout for so many muscle groups in one easy to use package. My pullup bars - which damaged a door frame inside the house - are finally being retired in favor of these much cheaper and far more versatile rings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. Solid thick rings
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. Solid thick rings. The rings are much bigger than I expected, but I've never had Olympic rings before. I was able to get these up and over something in about 10 minutes. When you put the strap together, it can be a slight bit tricky on how to do it, but I think the way it's done is what makes the straps so secure. I highly recommend these. Perfect for a few extra exercises to help strengthen my upper body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We used these rings and straps to help my mom ...
customer_reviews.text: We used these rings and straps to help my mom move around in her chair. She is an amputee and needs to move about to prevent pressure sores from occurring. These rings were helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Deona

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Hasn't slipped on me yet. They hang well enough from a door-frame pull-up bar. Grip is fine. Rings are study.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The ribbon the latch and the rings all feel like they're made of quality materials. Great bang for the buck. I weigh about 237lbs. And I don't feel like they would buckle at all. Again amazing quality and the price was even better.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good quality. Green not as neon as I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic rings feel solid--was worried they might be a cheesy compared to wood, but wanted to be able to leave them outside. I've hung them from a big tree branch. Note, 15' is the full strap length, so at most they will hang 7.5'ish to top of rings from whatever you hang them from (as they loop up and back). Straps and buckles seem to be of good quality. No instructions with these at all, but you'll figure it out. (Pay attention to arrows for strap routing imprinted on the buckle itself). I was hoping the green was a bright neon, but it's more of a cheery primary green.
customer_reviews.author: Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: The clasp that holds the dang strap broke loose and it doesnt hold ring in place anymore
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: are pretty nice, but one of the straps broke only ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The rings, themselves, are pretty nice, but one of the straps broke only two weeks after hanging them...the stitching literally tore out while my daughter was hanging on these (luckily wasn't too high up and wasn't upside down). Very disappointing. I'm keeping the rings, but have ordered new straps from a reputable company to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rings for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on rings. I have these set up on my pull up bar and have used them daily. The strap buckles are not the highest quality but for what I paid it is definitely 5 stars. I've had them for a few weeks so I can't speak to their longevity but again for around 20 bucks and as kind of an impulse buy I am very satisfied and use them daily!
customer_reviews.author: James Brady

customer_reviews.title: Gym quality at a non-gouging price.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I built an indoor structure to accommodate a bar, cargo net, rope swing, actual swing, etc. for my son to play on. He loves the rings in gymnastics class so I had him pick out a color and they’re perfect. The green is not quite as bright as pictured, more like a standard green crayon than the neon green it looks like but that’s no big deal. The straps are sturdy and the buckles have an engraved arrow to show which way you thread them through to hold. The opposite direction will result in them slipping. It’s easy set up and adjustment. As long as you have something to hang them from, you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kana McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: A Little Bendy but, for the Price, Can't Beat Them
customer_reviews.text: Work great - the rings are a little bit bendy and they shouldn't be, but for the price, I cannot complain. I have eyebolts through basement 2" x 10" rafters, one for each ring at about 20" apart, and have been enjoying learning and practicing various easy-level gymnastic moves like Skin The Cat and Archer Pullups.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Freides

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. The straps and buckles are really sturdy and the rings are solid texturized plastic. It comes with a booklet with instructions and the packaging shows they care for their customers. Only reason I give 4 stars instead of 5 is because the blue is actually purple, but Donatello was the coolest ninja turtle... so what the hell, I change my mind. 5 stars it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pull up bar in my exercise room. So attaching these was easy. I added two mesh bags to hold extra cable (see pic). Love the rings for push-ups, pull-ups, etc. So much I can do with these. Quality is good. No issues. Let's me do core work, chest work. Supplements my trx type straps. Nothing to say that would warn you off of these.
customer_reviews.author: S.Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Not safe
customer_reviews.text: The rings are fine, but the belt doesn't hold... Had to just tie a knot and hope they hold... Really not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ulyana Kulish

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I wanted it to be. Sturdy, safe, the straps are very long. The handles are hard plastic, does not feel cheap. For the record, I use it for upside down rows, dips and push ups only, have not used it for gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: As described in product description.
customer_reviews.text: I weight 240 pounds these hold me fine. They are sturdy plastic as described, just realize plastic is slicker than wood. I may eventually add grip tape or rubber to the rings for grip, its not necessary for basic dips and pull-ups but I probably wouldn’t want to do advanced gymnastics with sweaty hands on these. Have held up well in the couple of weeks I’ve had them. Make sure to set them up properly as they will slide down if you do not but that is user error.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Soled

customer_reviews.title: Good solid quality easy to adjust... great value
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my needs. Actually attached the rings to an I-Beam in the back storage area in my basement and adjust to the perfect height to do dips from the rings. I'm not good at it yet but I'm getting better. The balance part is tricky and challenging but It's doable and I think my strength and balance is improving through use of the rings.
customer_reviews.author: r.drew

customer_reviews.title: ... a door frame pull up bar and they work great. I had a little trouble feeding the material ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a door frame pull up bar and they work great. I had a little trouble feeding the material through the clamps, but was able to get the hang of it. There is a lot of excess material for my needs, so I may need to cut them. But overall, the quality is good and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Olsen

customer_reviews.title: These rings will get you hurt
customer_reviews.text: I currently own 3 sets of rings from different companies and these are the first I would strongly recommend you stay far away from one of the straps will randomly slip, causing you to free fall on one side opening up the chance to strain your other shoulder or fall outright. Cheap design on the clasp makes these dangerous
customer_reviews.author: David A

customer_reviews.title: Buckle slip a bit
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I have fed the strap the correct way. For the first couple of months, the rings worked fine, but after more months of continuous use, I found that after a set of pull ups, dips, or even push ups where my entire weight isn't on the rings, one of the rings would be lower than the other. To remedy this, I would have to feed the web through the opening of the buckle twice for each ring to make sure neither would slip. This is an inconvenience that eats up a minute or two to ensure safety.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tran

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what everyone needs in there gym !
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for ! Great add on to my home gym very sturdy and easy to set up and use I got them for multiple position pull-ups and dips also amazing for hanging leg raises ! Even with my weight belt and 45 hanging feel very secure and great grip !
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: I don't have anything to compare these rings to. ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare these rings to... complete newb. but they seem well made. I have one hanging from a different limb on a tree for the family to play on. I will probably go back and purchase these in different colors to hang from other branches.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C

customer_reviews.title: Solid build excellent for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Love this rings never new how weak you are until you try this plus its plenty of fun hanging about, also good for children to exercise and play. Can br hung from anything and adjusted for height or different workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cluck Cluck

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor training
customer_reviews.text: I hung these outdoors, under my second-story deck. The rings and straps held up well all spring before I took them down when we moved. The rings are heavy and have a nice bit of grippy quality to them. I’m glad i chose these.
customer_reviews.author: EPG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product in about 2 weeks but to be fair it was during the crazy Covid pandemic. The straps are sturdy and well made. I don't mind the plastic instead of the wooden rings. They grip great for me and could always use some gripping tape if I want to change it. Color is a pretty blue and they are now hanging in my garage ready to put my muscles to the test! Perfect addition to my little home gym. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the kids ninja gym
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak much for the straps but the rings are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Reviews2benefitu

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Mix up with my order, only received the rings without the straps. Sent the wrong ones back.....got the right ones, set them up on my pullup bar, and they hold me just fine (220lbs) extremely hard material.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Great for OCR training!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small course built in my yard and needed to add rings (something I was failing during races) and I now have 4 sets of these and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I recieved fast and excellent customer service when I was sent a new full set of rings after one of the buckles broke on the original strap. It may have been due to improper set up, as there are minimal instructions. Just make sure there is no cable tension on the “press” tab when setting them up and you should be fine. Overall a good product; I am happy with my purchase and would reccomend them to anyone interested in body weight excercise/ fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my granddaughter who is in gymnastics. She loves them and uses them every day. They’re easy for her mom and dad to put up and take down which is often since the bar she hands from is in the doorway of her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON R.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Well-Built Gymnast Rings
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the world of Gymnast Rings, but these are solid rings with trusty straps for 1/2 the price of others on the market. Didn't come with instructions, but there are plenty online if you can't figure it out on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy B

customer_reviews.title: Great indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to use the straps these work perfectly for added stretching movements along with pull up training. These are easy to move to various locations and I like that I can use them indoors or out. They really helped with my shoulder stability and pull up training.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great set for serious training
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended to these rings instead of the ones with hand grips because it makes everything harder. These are very sturdy and easy to wipe off/clean. Highly recommended if you want to push yourself pretty hard - which you should, because you're reading a review of rings that you're thinking of paying for.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wyne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Straps will not hold any weight, slips right out of clips
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The rings have decent weight to them and feel sturdy and durable. But that means nothing since the clamps on the straps couldn't hold my weight. I attempted to do dips but the rings started sliding down before I came close to getting my feet off the ground. Very disappointing. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: The most important exercise equipment
customer_reviews.text: If you only could buy one piece of exercise equipment, a pair of gym rings is it. these can be hung almost anywhere, and allow pull ups, dips, more challenging push ups, and other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: John Yurgil

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I've been using them in my backyard as workout tools. I will buy more when I move and have more room. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I like that the straps are easy to adjust to different lengths. In just a few seconds they can be lowered for a 5 year old or raised for a 20 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Boogiegirl

customer_reviews.title: One strap broke.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 10 of these and one strap broke! Not the thing you want to break while being upside down.
customer_reviews.author: TheTotalConcept

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought these years ago !
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best piece of exercise equipment. Easy to install, and easy to change lengths during exercise.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Solid rings for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great. Anyone who says they don't hold their weight isn't feeding the bracket correctly. These rings are sturdy and functional. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: They love them, and with the adjustable strap I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Put these in the garage for my kids to get some strength conditioning. They love them, and with the adjustable strap I can use them for pull-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The rings are great. I've only been using m I've for about a week, so I'll with in after done more time has passed, but these have been, again, great so far. I bought these for calisthenics, and they hold up to weight, the plastic is durable, and the straps are long, giving plenty of room to play with. I'm looking forward to advancing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cook

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rings
customer_reviews.text: I love these rings. I installed them in my garage and now every time I go in there I have to swing on them and do a backflip.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: The straps are long enough for what I need and the rings feel strong. They don’t feel as thick as traditional gym rings are but I won’t yet be doing anything strenuous enough on them to warrant that quality. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Matias Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Happy I chose this
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints at all. Great for ring pushups, pullups, dips, etc. I even use these for weighted pullups, and they have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Polinsky

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and use. I can't report on durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son is in gymnastics so we purchased these for him to practice. Very well made. Even I, all 6"3 290 lbs of me, can play on them.
customer_reviews.author: usmcdad

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I like these rings, but the strap slips easily (and I'm only 150 lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Alan Mills

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loves them
customer_reviews.text: He'd been wanting rings for awhile so I got these as a gift. He uses them a couple times a week. He wants higher quality ones later, but says these are great for starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Monica S.

customer_reviews.title: Great backyard gear
customer_reviews.text: High quality set. Convenient Velcro on the straps to help keep everything neat when not in use. Have only used a handful of times, but so far so good. I might add some grip tape, but that's a personal preference. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: ishapespace

customer_reviews.title: Needs shorter clamps
customer_reviews.text: They metal clamps broke in half since they are too long after about 6 months of use but it still works
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great rings, but the buckles are sub par.
customer_reviews.text: Great rings, but the buckles are sub par. Mine snapped about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Bang for your buck you can get
customer_reviews.text: Not my first pair or set of rings for this brand. I can say its a great product, no problems so far in using it all around its easy to carry and to install, would like if wooden rings were to be sold by Reehut but i guess it will probably be later on. I may add pictures later and update review
customer_reviews.author: LXIII

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are kicking my butt. I thought I was strong until I started working out with these
customer_reviews.author: Dborah Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and they were super easy to set up. Great way for them to get a little excecise outside.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: great for dips and push ups
customer_reviews.text: Attach these to my pull up bar, great for dips and push ups. Easy to adjust and very durable. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my only complain is the manual, that is bad translated from chinese I guess.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazonman

customer_reviews.title: simple & sturdy
customer_reviews.text: There is quite a long list of exercises the rings can provide for the body: pull ups, push ups , dips , butterflies, curls, core exercises , quadriceps lifts. This will complement a work out for sure.
customer_reviews.author: charles lively

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: A year later my kids still pay with these! No issues at all!
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Buckle will not hold on one of the rings
customer_reviews.text: I'm way under the weight limit (190 lbs) and the buckle won't hold on one of the rings. Poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Patrick O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look sturdy and I've identified a beam to hang them from. where is the ebook? banis@banis-associates.com
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bud Banis

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and at a good price. I have no issues with it
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My package was stolen but luckily i had a camera recording & the police were able to catch the perpetrators. Wish the driver would have hid it or made it harder for someone passing by, to see it.the product is great tho
customer_reviews.author: Serg.R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome rings especially for the price!!!! Cant beat this deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best on Amazon. Very cool. I read other reviews and this item help up against my weight just like others mentioned. The rings are nice and heavy, but not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: TheNetwork

customer_reviews.title: Really Solid Product!
customer_reviews.text: These rings are a really solid product. The straps that come along with the rings are easy to use and move, which has allowed us to move the rings around
customer_reviews.author: H. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Works great but it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Looks great at first but after use off and on for about two months the metal clip that holds the gadget together broke off. Maybe I should’ve spend the couple extra bucks on a higher quality brand of rings.
customer_reviews.author: Fazle Rabbi

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 4yo gymnast. For now, during the winter, they are on his chin up bar in his doorway. He and his sibs love these. May put them out on a tree in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Todd/Diane

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: The rings were easy to install. They work great in our garage to supplement work outs for the whole family. Our 13 year old and two year old love them and it helps us stay active and have fun during these unusual times.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke D. Zueck

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the rings for my son to practice for gymnastics. Now I use them too. They are very well made and sturdy. The straps are strong and I feel very safe when using them.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product needs Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! But I never found any instructions on how to feed the straps through the cambuckle properly. Luckily I was already familiar with how to do this. If not it would have been difficult.
customer_reviews.author: B Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal for a solid pair of plastic rings. I use them for dips and push ups at the park. If I had a spot to do muscle ups I would tape them for better grip. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Only downside is them being plastic so they get a bit slippery when your hands sweat. Great overall though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to set up on my pull-up bar! I’m using these strictly for ring rows right now so they have been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: They're good
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, I was surprised how good they are
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! Seller is the Best! had an issue and it was resolved!!
customer_reviews.author: LA Prum

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: These are super durable and love adding them to my ninja gym in my backyard
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: They work well.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with these. I'd prefer wood but I didn't want to shell out the money.
customer_reviews.author: Vancouver Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not all parts were sent
customer_reviews.text: There was only one strap & buckle. Not much I can do with two rings and one strap. I tried to return, but haven’t heard anything back
customer_reviews.author: Philly

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of different exercises with these and they work quite well
customer_reviews.author: Rob Malet

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: GOOD price for A useful training tool at a good price. Amazingly fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: straps are great, and the rings are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: these rings are dope. straps are great, and the rings are sturdy. I've had more expensive pairs of rings that I liked less
customer_reviews.author: Jak Nieuwenhuis

customer_reviews.title: Best, Cheapest Rings on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered and trustworthy from seeing the reviews... not to mention this is the cheapest and the best plastic rings on Amazon! I was going between plastic and wood since some people prefer wood over plastic for the grip and whatever else... but I HAD to get these cause (1) I don't sweat really so no need to pay almost double for wood, (2) the price... you can't beat it for the great quality, and (3) they seem to be longer lasting than wood. Plus I get my favorite color! Anyway, I love this and I'd totally buy again (:
customer_reviews.author: J Mac

customer_reviews.title: It's really amazing they can imitate a lot movements
customer_reviews.text: One of the best invest ever in my fitness life!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: handle circumference is a bit small but serve the purpose!
customer_reviews.author: ShouldHaveAmazonStock

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and durable, can hang them pretty much anywhere and get a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Great for my home ninja gym
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, straps are well made, quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, great addition to my home gym. Holds 220lbs with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: So far these are great! We have them in the backyard hanging from ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great! We have them in the backyard hanging from a tree!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: strength product
customer_reviews.text: It is a really strength product. I weigth 240lb (120kg), and it resist like a charm. It is only a bit counter-intuitive the blockage system of the buckle, but it is easy to realise if it is being used in the right direction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buckle not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed the buckle broke 2 months after owning it :( My kids were hanging on the rings when I noticed the chip. Maybe I had a faulty unit, but it's past the 30 day window to return. UPDATE: The seller sent me a replacement, free of charge!
customer_reviews.author: Jed

customer_reviews.title: As good as expected
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I'm stronger than ever and rings have performed really well
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat them for the money. They work as expected and seam very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jef

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner rings
customer_reviews.text: Owned rings for 2 months now and use at least 4 times a week with no visible wear on them. Straps are easy to adjust but rings are a little rough due to the grainy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: REEHUT Gymnastic Rings with Adjustable Straps, Metal Buckles & Ebook - Home Gym (Set of 2) - Non-Slip - Great for Workout, Strength Training, Fitness, Pull Ups and Dips, Ebook Included
feature_bullets: Package Included: 2 gymnastic rings with straps (1" wide and 15ft long) and adjusting buckles, 16 Pages Ebook included.
The stability straps are made out of strong polycarbonate nylon, won't buckle or bend, easily adjustable to suit your needs.
ABS plastic rings reduce slippage associated with sweaty hands. 300 lbs rated heavy duty.

Engage your muscles and core with exercises such as pull ups, push ups, dips, rows, muscle ups, chest flies and so on for a functional and varied free range of movement. Treat pains in the cervical vertebra and hunch back.

Exclusive service: All REEHUT products are backed by a 30-day replacement or refund, a two-year warranty and lifetime customer support. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us and enjoy your exclusive service.
